reviews.author: John Smith
reviews.text: The Green Gardeners did a fantastic job replacing our water main. Very professional and tidy work.

reviews.author: Sarah Johnson
reviews.text: Excellent service. They came quickly when we had an emergency leak and fixed it with minimal disruption.

reviews.author: Michael Thompson
reviews.text: Great job replacing our lead pipe. The team was professional, fast and left everything clean. Would highly recommend!

reviews.author: Emma Wilson
reviews.text: Very pleased with the pipe repair service. They explained everything clearly and completed the job quickly.

reviews.author: David Brown
reviews.text: The Green Gardeners sorted our water pressure issues within a day. Professional service from start to finish.

reviews.author: Jennifer Taylor
reviews.text: Had a complex water main issue that other companies couldn't solve. The Green Gardeners diagnosed and fixed it in one visit. Impressive!
